reviews.review_msg: I took both Crim 101 and Crim 104. Loved Barry in both. He's an amazing teacher and goes into depth with his lectures. When lecturing he'll make jokes (like sending the TA's up to the students that talk during lecture to beat them) and have funny pictures on the slides to keep students engaged. Would definitely take his classes again.

Super-easy prof for 101 and 104; in fact both of these classes are EERILY identical with each other in terms of content, lecture outline and the tutorial components. Best way to study for the tests is the powerpoint slides and reviewing tutorial components (flashcards especially). I would 10/10 take a class with him again in the future.
